pr_title: enable jackson after-burner module as based on jackson recommendation…

timeline.message: enable jackson after-burner module as based on jackson recommendation it has perf benefit (10%-20%) improvement in serialization/deserialization

timeline.bodyText:
Though its not related to your PR, but I am wondering, why do we have separate ObjectMapper instance here ?
Why don't we use the one from Utils.java ?
Reason for asking this question is, we don't register objectMapper with all the modules here.
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText:
The ObjectMapper from Utils is used for handling user data, and may require special configuration.
This one is used for handling internal constructs not user data. Assuming Naveen's diagnostics is working, we shouldn't change anything here.
replies.author: moderakh
